title: Ray Lewis' memoir covers racism, Atlanta murders and difficult upbringing
text:
Published By: Baltimore Sun: Ravens - Today 
Ray Lewis said he was treated "worse than any dog" when he was arrested and jailed in Atlanta while a suspect in the murder of two men after...
